publ: by Benay Dara-Abrams, Sensory Data Science
name: MyWork-from-HomeCoach
0:
”Alexa, ask home office coach, how can I deal with interruptions.”
”What can I do about getting things done?”
”Tell me a good way to handle feeling like part of the team.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home office coach
des: My Work-from-Home Coach provides time-tested strategies to help you successfully deal with the challenges that come with working-from-home. Typical work-from-home problems include dealing with interruptions, feeling like part of the team, getting things done, finishing tasks, and sitting in front of your computer for too long. You can launch My Work-from-Home Coach and ask Alexa questions like "How can I deal with interruptions?" or "Tell me a good way to handle feeling like part of the team." or "What can I do about getting things done?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
